thread.title: Carvajal: "Disfruto de los mejores del mundo en el Madrid y en La Roja"
thread.title_full: Carvajal: "Disfruto de los mejores del mundo en el Madrid y en La Roja"

author: marca.com
title: Carvajal: "Disfruto de los mejores del mundo en el Madrid y en La Roja"
text:
Spain 4-1 Israel Defender featured in 4-1 win over Israel Carvajal revelling in Real Madrid and Spain success Shared Updated 24/03/2017 23:59 CET 
A s a defender, Friday's 4-1 victory over Israel will not be one of Dani Carvajal's most memorable evenings in a Spain shirt but he was quick to make clear he enjoyed being part of what he considers to be the world's best team at both domestic and international level. 
Carvajal has recovered well from an injury which threatened to derail his season and looks set to be a regular for both club and country for some time to come. 
"I am lucky to be able to enjoy being part of the best teams in the world with both Real Madrid and the national team," he explained. 
The match against Israel didn't present the 25-year-old with his toughest challenge defensively and he made clear that as a result he was able to push forward and attack effectively. 
"The coach was asking me to come and join the attacks, my opponent was fast but I really enjoyed pushing forward," said Carvajal. 
It was an important victory for La Roja with Italy likely to push them all the way in the race to qualify for the 2018 World Cup and the importance of creating momentum was not lost on goalscorer David Silva.. 
"I am very happy with my goal but the victory is above everything," the Manchester City man told 'Teledeporte'. 
"The balance of the team is very positive and we are doing a great job but we must continue in this way." BEST OF MARCA
